name: Social Network App
description: Social Network app built using MERN stack, with Heroku in the backend. Lets user create an account and update profie details for other to view.

name: Weather Forecast
description: A weather forecast app to get live weather of all around the world. Chart built using ChartJS

name: Marvel Characters
description: World of Marvel Comics Characters, search for your favourite Marvel Character and find all the details about them.

name: MERN Shopping List
description: Shopping list app built with the MERN stack along with Redux for state management, Reactstrap and react-transition-group.

name: Reddit Search
description: Search for the whole of reddit! VanillaJS, Reddit-API

name: Budget App
description: App to keep track of your expenses. Enter your budget and all the expenses to get the remaining balance amount.

name: Movie Info
description: Search for your favourite movie and get all the details about the movie.

name: Type-N-Speak
description: Type and speak app with speech synthesis using the Web Speech API.

name: Weight Converter
description: Convert weight to different units between Kilogram, Pounds, Grams and Ounces.

name: Countdown Timer
description: A basic Countdown Timer app built Vanilla JS, HTML and CSS

name: Drag and Drop
description: A simple app demonstrating drag and drap feature in VanillaJS

name: Mock Data API
description: Backend API server providing mock data with different end-points

name: Login and Registration
description: Login and registration app using Node.js, Express, Passport, Mongoose, EJS and some other packages.
